name: Knights of Ages
description:
In the vast Galtian Continent, where the sun rises first, heroes stopped the invasion of the barbarians, founded the six peaceful and prosperous kingdoms, and left the immortal epics.

As time goes by, the original vows are forgotten by the rulers, and the continent is sunk in war fire again. During the chaos, seize the chance to be a tyrant of the continent, or loyal to the knight’s norm, save the innocent, my lord, what is your choice? !

Knights of Ages is a turn-based SRPG game with exciting fights, a grand worldview, attractive stories, challenging missions, various gameplay, and a unique artstyle.

In the game, the player will found a strong mercenary group, fight around the continent and conquer cities and lands. Meanwhile, the player has to manipulate among different powers, align with them through marriages, raise offspring, and inherit your family bloodline for ages!
